member.name: D3D12_SHADER_MIN_PRECISION_SUPPORT
member.summary: Describes minimum precision support options for shaders in the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_MIN_PRECISION_SUPPORT.D3D12_SHADER_MIN_PRECISION_SUPPORT_NONE
member.summary: The driver supports only full 32-bit precision for all shader stages.
